casebody.data:
POWELL
v.
BOURLON & DAVIS. No. 441P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Arnold Powell, Bunn, for Powell, Arnold. John M. Bourlon, for Bourdon & Davis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of December 2015 by Petitioner for Request for an Order to Compel:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
